description: Data reflect the statewide caseloads for Community Supervision within the Department of Public Safety and Community Supervision, to include:  parole, mandatory	release, probation, probation before judgement, Drinking Driver Monitor Program (DDMP).  The data set also contains the statewide average for cases per monitor for Community Supervision.

metadata.attribution: Department of Public Safety and Corretional Services

name: Community Supervision - Caseloads
